transcript: For instance, one time, it had been raining several days, and this one kid, he came up to me, and he gave me his last pair of dry socks. Put them in my pocket.

segments.text: For instance, one time, it had been raining several days, and this one kid, he came up to me, and he gave me his last pair of dry socks.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: For instance, one time, it had to have been raining several days. There was this one kid, he came up to me and he gave me his last pair of dry socks. Put them in my pocket.
